mapper.update: update card_accounts set sno = #{sno,jdbcType=CHAR}, regist_date = #{registDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, validity_date = #{validityDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sub_person_type = #{subPersonType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, water = #{water,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electricity = #{electricity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select card_no, sno, regist_date, validity_date, bank_account, created_at, updated_at, sub_person_type, balance, water, electricity, `status` from card_accounts where card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
select card_no, sno, regist_date, validity_date, bank_account, created_at, updated_at, sub_person_type, balance, water, electricity, `status` from card_accounts
